"レベル75制限解除試験・Ｇｕ":
"This is a test to release Gunner's limits.
By acquiring the specified titles,
you'll be able to obtain higher levels.

※Requires the title from grinding a ★13
Rifle or Twin Machinegun to +35
※Requires title from completing Lisa's
client order [The Perfect Gunner IV]."
"Obtain the title [Pioneer of Gunner NT Upgrades]"
